# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(mitake LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(mitake "")
set_target_properties(mitake PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "mitake")
set_target_properties(mitake PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/debug")
target_include_directories(mitake PRIVATE
    include
)
set_target_properties(mitake PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(mitake PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(mitake PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(mitake PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(mitake PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(mitake PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET mitake PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(mitake PRIVATE
    src/mitake.cpp
)
